name: spherical zoo in a vacuum
description:
My submission for the 2021 Kenney game jam. Theme is Rotation.

a straightforward physics-y match-3 game. Make groups of 3 or more animals of the same type to score points.

Best played on a MIDI controller: by turning a dial on a MIDI controller and pressing keys on the piano keyboard.

keyboard controls in case you are not a weird audio nerd who has several MIDI devices laying around: left/right arrow keys + space.

All credit for the assets of course goes to www.kenney.nl
